title: Remodels
content: Kitchen and bathroom cabinetry, countertops, and tilework

title: Renovations
content: Designing and building new rooms, as well as expanding or reconfiguring existing spaces

title: Flooring
content: Installation and repair of hardwood, laminate, carpeted and tiled floors

title: Painting
content: Color consultation, painting, staining and other finishing work for interiors, exteriors, furniture and wallpaper

title: Upgrades
content: Includes window and door replacement, insulation, and handicap accessibility

title: Consultations
content: Advisory services helping clients make informed decisions on construction and renovation projects, including layout services and furniture placement

title: Shelving
content: Bookshelves, entertainment centers, and storage solutions

title: Millwork
content: Crown molding, wainscoting, and other decorative elements

title: Cabinetry
content: Includes (but not limited to) closets, laundry rooms, bathroom cabinets and other functional spaces

title: Exterior Carpentry
content: Includes (but not limited to) decks, porches, pergolas, and other outdoor living spaces such as fences, gates, and trellises

title: Furniture
content: Design and fabrication, such as tables, chairs, and bed frames

title: Window Treatment
content: Includes design and installation, blinds, shades, and curtains
